60.1.hd_quote: The ability to maintain inner harmony when confronted by external limitations.
60.1.behavioral_axis: Holds steady in limitation, trusting the mutative pulse.
60.1.shadow_axis: Restless melancholy when limitation is not accepted.

60.2.hd_quote: The understanding of the nature of limitation.
60.2.behavioral_axis: Shows others how to accept restraints to seize openings.
60.2.shadow_axis: Ignores limits for ego gratification → predictable suffering.

60.3.hd_quote: Enlightened self-interest that naturally handles restrictions and limitations, ensuring identity and security.
60.3.behavioral_axis: Tests/breaks bonds to discover a workable limitation.
60.3.shadow_axis: Gets addicted to specific limits; no mutation.

60.4.hd_quote: It lies in being able to release oneself from the pressure to mutate.
60.4.behavioral_axis: Knows mutation will come → relaxes the field.

60.5.hd_quote: The awareness that the destruction of the old limitations simply creates new ones.
60.5.behavioral_axis: Teaches that mutation replaces, not removes, limitation.
60.5.shadow_axis: Leads people to ‘break’ limits that only regenerate.

60.6.hd_quote: The intuitive intellect to recognize when absolute rigidity is essential.
60.6.behavioral_axis: Holds the line so mutation is authentic, not premature.
